item.title: Deploying an overcloud in OCP with Openstack Director Operator (OSPdO)
item.description: This tutorial aims to provide an OpenStack deployment procedure using the OpenStack director operator on OpenShift, utilizing minimal OpenStack templates and steps. The tutorial is based on OpenStack 17.1. Blog GitHub Repo
